lead_paragraph: Trabzonspor's Salih Dursun was sent off for showing the referee a red card during his team's 2-1 defeat by Galatasaray in a fractious Turkish league encounter on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Trabzonspor Player Sent Off for Showing Referee Red Card
headline.main: Trabzonspor Player Sent Off for Showing Referee Red Card

snippet: Trabzonspor's Salih Dursun was sent off for showing the referee a red card during his team's 2-1 defeat by Galatasaray in a fractious Turkish league encounter on Sunday....
